text.name: info1
text.text: The Sega Model 3 is an arcade platform produced by Sega.

text.name: info2
text.text: It is a successor to the Sega Model 2 platform, and was released in 1996.

text.name: info3
text.text: The Model 3 was succeeded by the Sega NAOMI in 1998, followed by

text.name: info4
text.text: the Sega Hikaru in 1999 and Sega NAOMI 2 in 2000.

text.name: info5
text.text: The Model 3 was designed to push as many textured polygons as possible

text.name: info6
text.text: in real-time, along with the most advanced graphical techniques available

text.name: info7
text.text: at the time, such as multisample anti-aliasing, motion blur, facial

text.name: info8
text.text: animation, specular highlighting/reflection/shading, and multiple light sources.
